feedback:
The plan does not specify how the 'date of joining' field will be handled for existing records in the database.
Step 4 mentions a migration script but does not provide details on how it will be implemented or what it will do.
The plan does not address how timezone differences will be handled when validating the 'date of joining' field.
Step 3 should specify how the backend will differentiate between new and existing registrations when validating the 'date of joining' field.
The plan does not mention any specific error messages that will be displayed for invalid or missing 'date of joining' inputs.
Step 1 should specify how the Material Design date picker will be configured to prevent future dates.
